metadata.title: CVE-2023-40546 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: [mok: fix LogError() invocationOn some ARM platform, jlinton noticed that when we fail to set avariable (because it isn't supported at all, presumably), our errormessage has an extra argument that doesn't match the format string.This patch removes the extra argument.]

criterions.comment: secureboot-db package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
shim-signed package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
shim package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
